content:
I'd be happy to help you find some cashback offers or discounts on household essentials like toilet paper, paper towels, and trash bags.

**Ibotta:**

1. Open the Ibotta app or visit their website: [www.ibotta.com](http://www.ibotta.com)
2. Search for the following brands or products:
	* Toilet paper: Charmin, Cottonelle, or Quilted Northern
	* Paper towels: Bounty, Brawny, or Scott
	* Trash bags: Hefty, Glad, or Kitchen Trash Bags
3. Browse the available offers and select the ones you want to add to your account
4. Check the offer details, including the cashback amount, expiration date, and any purchase requirements
5. Link your loyalty card or upload your receipt to redeem the offer

Current Ibotta offers (subject to change):

* $1.00 cashback on Charmin toilet paper (12-roll pack)
* $0.50 cashback on Bounty paper towels (6-roll pack)
* $1.00 cashback on Hefty trash bags (50-count)

**Fetch Rewards:**

1. Open the Fetch Rewards app or visit their website: [www.fetchrewards.com](http://www.fetchrewards.com)
2. Search for the following brands or products:
	* Toilet paper: Charmin, Cottonelle, or Quilted Northern
	* Paper towels: Bounty, Brawny, or Scott
	* Trash bags: Hefty, Glad, or Kitchen Trash Bags
3. Browse the available offers and select the ones you want to add to your account
4. Check the offer details, including the point value, expiration date, and any purchase requirements
5. Scan your receipt or link your loyalty card to redeem the offer

Current Fetch Rewards offers (subject to change):

* 1,000 points on Charmin toilet paper (12-roll pack)
* 500 points on Bounty paper towels (6-roll pack)
* 1,000 points on Hefty trash bags (50-count)

**Other Cashback Apps:**

1. Checkout 51: [www.checkout51.com](http://www.checkout51.com)
2. RetailMeNot: [www.retailmenot.com](http://www.retailmenot.com)
3. Dosh: [www.dosh.com](http://www.dosh.com)

These apps often feature cashback offers on household essentials, so it's worth checking them out as well.

**Manufacturer Coupons:**

1. Visit the websites of the manufacturers you're interested in (e.g., Charmin, Bounty, Hefty) and sign up for their newsletters or coupon programs.
2. Check websites like Coupons.com or CouponCabin for printable coupons or digital coupons for these products.

**Store Sales:**

1. Check the weekly ads for your local stores (e.g., Walmart, Target, Giant Food Stores) to see if they have any sales on toilet paper, paper towels, or trash bags.
2. Look for buy-one-get-one-free (BOGO) deals or discounts on these items.

Remember to always check the expiration dates and terms of each offer before making a purchase, as they may vary or expire. You can also combine these cashback offers with other coupons or discounts to maximize your savings!

I hope this helps you find some great deals on household essentials!
